workflows.name: bmad-init
workflows.displayName: BMAD system initialization and maintenance workflow for agent manifest generation and system configuration
workflows.description: BMAD system initialization and maintenance workflow for agent manifest generation and system configuration

workflows.name: party-mode
workflows.displayName: Orchestrates group discussions between all installed BMAD agents, enabling natural multi-agent conversations
workflows.description: Orchestrates group discussions between all installed BMAD agents, enabling natural multi-agent conversations

workflows.name: convert-legacy
workflows.displayName: Converts legacy BMAD v4 or similar items (agents, workflows, modules) to BMad Core compliant format with proper structure and conventions
workflows.description: Converts legacy BMAD v4 or similar items (agents, workflows, modules) to BMad Core compliant format with proper structure and conventions

workflows.name: build-agent
workflows.displayName: Interactive workflow to build BMAD Core compliant agents (simple, expert, or module types) with optional brainstorming for agent ideas, proper persona development, activation rules, and command structure
workflows.description: Interactive workflow to build BMAD Core compliant agents (simple, expert, or module types) with optional brainstorming for agent ideas, proper persona development, activation rules, and command structure

workflows.name: build-module
workflows.displayName: Interactive workflow to build complete BMAD modules with agents, workflows, tasks, and installation infrastructure
workflows.description: Interactive workflow to build complete BMAD modules with agents, workflows, tasks, and installation infrastructure

workflows.name: build-workflow
workflows.displayName: Interactive workflow builder that guides creation of new BMAD workflows with proper structure and validation for optimal human-AI collaboration. Includes optional brainstorming phase for workflow ideas and design.
workflows.description: Interactive workflow builder that guides creation of new BMAD workflows with proper structure and validation for optimal human-AI collaboration. Includes optional brainstorming phase for workflow ideas and design.

workflows.name: edit-workflow
workflows.displayName: Edit existing BMAD workflows while following all best practices and conventions
workflows.description: Edit existing BMAD workflows while following all best practices and conventions

workflows.name: module-brief
workflows.displayName: Create a comprehensive Module Brief that serves as the blueprint for building new BMAD modules using strategic analysis and creative vision
workflows.description: Create a comprehensive Module Brief that serves as the blueprint for building new BMAD modules using strategic analysis and creative vision

workflows.name: redoc
workflows.displayName: Autonomous documentation system that maintains module, workflow, and agent documentation using a reverse-tree approach (leaf folders first, then parents). Understands BMAD conventions and produces technical writer quality output.
workflows.description: Autonomous documentation system that maintains module, workflow, and agent documentation using a reverse-tree approach (leaf folders first, then parents). Understands BMAD conventions and produces technical writer quality output.

workflows.name: brainstorm-game
workflows.displayName: Facilitate game brainstorming sessions by orchestrating the CIS brainstorming workflow with game-specific context, guidance, and additional game design techniques.
workflows.description: Facilitate game brainstorming sessions by orchestrating the CIS brainstorming workflow with game-specific context, guidance, and additional game design techniques.

workflows.name: brainstorm-project
workflows.displayName: Facilitate project brainstorming sessions by orchestrating the CIS brainstorming workflow with project-specific context and guidance.
workflows.description: Facilitate project brainstorming sessions by orchestrating the CIS brainstorming workflow with project-specific context and guidance.

workflows.name: game-brief
workflows.displayName: Interactive game brief creation workflow that guides users through defining their game vision with multiple input sources and conversational collaboration
workflows.description: Interactive game brief creation workflow that guides users through defining their game vision with multiple input sources and conversational collaboration

workflows.name: product-brief
workflows.displayName: Interactive product brief creation workflow that guides users through defining their product vision with multiple input sources and conversational collaboration
workflows.description: Interactive product brief creation workflow that guides users through defining their product vision with multiple input sources and conversational collaboration

workflows.name: research
workflows.displayName: Adaptive research workflow supporting multiple research types: market research, deep research prompt generation, technical/architecture evaluation, competitive intelligence, user research, and domain analysis
workflows.description: Adaptive research workflow supporting multiple research types: market research, deep research prompt generation, technical/architecture evaluation, competitive intelligence, user research, and domain analysis

workflows.name: plan-project
workflows.displayName: Scale-adaptive project planning workflow for all project levels (0-4). Automatically adjusts outputs based on project scope - from single atomic changes (Level 0: tech-spec only) to enterprise platforms (Level 4: full PRD + epics). Level 2-4 route to 3-solutioning workflow for architecture and tech specs. Generates appropriate planning artifacts for each level.
workflows.description: Scale-adaptive project planning workflow for all project levels (0-4). Automatically adjusts outputs based on project scope - from single atomic changes (Level 0: tech-spec only) to enterprise platforms (Level 4: full PRD + epics). Level 2-4 route to 3-solutioning workflow for architecture and tech specs. Generates appropriate planning artifacts for each level.

workflows.name: tech-spec
workflows.displayName: Generate a comprehensive Technical Specification from PRD and Architecture with acceptance criteria and traceability mapping
workflows.description: Generate a comprehensive Technical Specification from PRD and Architecture with acceptance criteria and traceability mapping

workflows.name: solution-architecture
workflows.displayName: Scale-adaptive solution architecture generation with dynamic template sections. Replaces legacy HLA workflow with modern BMAD Core compliance.
workflows.description: Scale-adaptive solution architecture generation with dynamic template sections. Replaces legacy HLA workflow with modern BMAD Core compliance.

workflows.name: correct-course
workflows.displayName: Navigate significant changes during sprint execution by analyzing impact, proposing solutions, and routing for implementation
workflows.description: Navigate significant changes during sprint execution by analyzing impact, proposing solutions, and routing for implementation

workflows.name: create-story
workflows.displayName: Create the next user story markdown from epics/PRD and architecture, using a standard template and saving to the stories folder
workflows.description: Create the next user story markdown from epics/PRD and architecture, using a standard template and saving to the stories folder

workflows.name: dev-story
workflows.displayName: Execute a story by implementing tasks/subtasks, writing tests, validating, and updating the story file per acceptance criteria
workflows.description: Execute a story by implementing tasks/subtasks, writing tests, validating, and updating the story file per acceptance criteria

workflows.name: retrospective
workflows.displayName: Run after epic completion to review overall success, extract lessons learned, and explore if new information emerged that might impact the next epic
workflows.description: Run after epic completion to review overall success, extract lessons learned, and explore if new information emerged that might impact the next epic

workflows.name: review-story
workflows.displayName: Perform a Senior Developer Review on a completed story flagged Ready for Review, leveraging story-context, epic tech-spec, repo docs, MCP servers for latest best-practices, and web search as fallback. Appends structured review notes to the story.
workflows.description: Perform a Senior Developer Review on a completed story flagged Ready for Review, leveraging story-context, epic tech-spec, repo docs, MCP servers for latest best-practices, and web search as fallback. Appends structured review notes to the story.

workflows.name: story-context
workflows.displayName: Assemble a dynamic Story Context XML by pulling latest documentation and existing code/library artifacts relevant to a drafted story
workflows.description: Assemble a dynamic Story Context XML by pulling latest documentation and existing code/library artifacts relevant to a drafted story

workflows.name: brainstorming
workflows.displayName: Facilitate interactive brainstorming sessions using diverse creative techniques. This workflow facilitates interactive brainstorming sessions using diverse creative techniques. The session is highly interactive, with the AI acting as a facilitator to guide the user through various ideation methods to generate and refine creative solutions.
workflows.description: Facilitate interactive brainstorming sessions using diverse creative techniques. This workflow facilitates interactive brainstorming sessions using diverse creative techniques. The session is highly interactive, with the AI acting as a facilitator to guide the user through various ideation methods to generate and refine creative solutions.

workflows.name: design-thinking
workflows.displayName: Guide human-centered design processes using empathy-driven methodologies. This workflow walks through the design thinking phases - Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, and Test - to create solutions deeply rooted in user needs.
workflows.description: Guide human-centered design processes using empathy-driven methodologies. This workflow walks through the design thinking phases - Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, and Test - to create solutions deeply rooted in user needs.

workflows.name: innovation-strategy
workflows.displayName: Identify disruption opportunities and architect business model innovation. This workflow guides strategic analysis of markets, competitive dynamics, and business model innovation to uncover sustainable competitive advantages and breakthrough opportunities.
workflows.description: Identify disruption opportunities and architect business model innovation. This workflow guides strategic analysis of markets, competitive dynamics, and business model innovation to uncover sustainable competitive advantages and breakthrough opportunities.

workflows.name: problem-solving
workflows.displayName: Apply systematic problem-solving methodologies to crack complex challenges. This workflow guides through problem diagnosis, root cause analysis, creative solution generation, evaluation, and implementation planning using proven frameworks.
workflows.description: Apply systematic problem-solving methodologies to crack complex challenges. This workflow guides through problem diagnosis, root cause analysis, creative solution generation, evaluation, and implementation planning using proven frameworks.

workflows.name: storytelling
workflows.displayName: Craft compelling narratives using proven story frameworks and techniques. This workflow guides users through structured narrative development, applying appropriate story frameworks to create emotionally resonant and engaging stories for any purpose.
workflows.description: Craft compelling narratives using proven story frameworks and techniques. This workflow guides users through structured narrative development, applying appropriate story frameworks to create emotionally resonant and engaging stories for any purpose.
